title: Ruthless Heart
description: She’s about to ruin his career.He’s about to ruin her life.No one messes with the Santo boys. Rich, talented and with the world at their feet, they’re anything but saints. You’re either with them or against them…and you’d have to be stupid to be against them.Ava Bryant isn’t stupid, but one night of being in the wrong bed at the right time is coming back to haunt her. Now one of the Santos is out for blood. Specifically, her blood. Thankfully, he never saw her face, and Ava plans to keep it that way.Jett Santo has had his career trajectory planned since birth: top the college league and get drafted into the NFL. But when a failed drug test threatens to end his dreams, Jett finds himself racing against the clock to clear his name.All because of some mystery blonde. Well, if he’s going to suffer, so is she.But there’s a thin line between love and hate, and neither Ava nor Jett is prepared for the consequences when both begin to blur.RUTHLESS HEART is book one in the interconnected Ruthless Devils series, featuring bullies, enemies-to-lovers and super hot footballers—no matter what team you’re on. This book contains mature content, including cursing and an incident of drink spiking, but there is no non-con involved.
author: Eve L. Mitchell
